# mmer <img src="man/figures/logo.png" align="right" height="200" alt="" />


<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The package `mmer` is the software implementation of the Multimodel Marginal Epistasis test.

<img src="man/figures/dhs_manhattan.png"  width="100%" alt="Erythroid differentiation DHS sites MME analysis" />

## Installation

You can install the development version of mmer from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("jdstamp/mmer")
```
